title: Episode 149: The Wrongful Conviction of Clemente Aguirre-Jarquin
description:
A young man with his whole life ahead of him set his sights on sunny Florida in order to escape life-threatening gang violence in his hometown. But when he arrived, he found himself in the wrong place at the wrong time. After a hasty trial, he was convicted of double murder and faced a death sentence. Would DNA and multiple confessions from another suspect be enough to set him free?

If you would like to support Clemente, you can donate at https://www.mightycause.com/story/Clementeaguirree2019
